biotools.summary: A tool that provides a combinatorial approach to identify potential pathogenic variations, that associates the following data: localization within the protein, conservation, biochemical properties of the mutant and wild-type residues, and the potential impact of the variation on mRNA.

bioschemas.name: UMD-Predictor
bioschemas.summary: A tool that provides a combinatorial approach to identify potential pathogenic variations, that associates the following data: localization within the protein, conservation, biochemical properties of the mutant and wild-type residues, and the potential impact of the variation on mRNA.
